Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. This product is not just an item, but a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering the value it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make a decision soon. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
